data.name: Age of Reforging:Blackthorn
data.detailed_description:
Just Updated

http://store.steampowered.com/app/1194930


About the Game

The story happens in a disordered region called the Freelands, consists of several city states and trade towns while slavery is still a universal thing here. You – a legendary gladiator will lead a rebellion of gladiators, fight slave hunter who once took control of the whole Freelands, and reveal the mysterious behind the scene. Gather your party, upraise and fight for your freedom, reveal and overthrown the evil force behind and conquer the Freelands.

Core game play:



1) Fight back your freedom:
Play as a slave gladiator and experience the hard journey from a rookie Gladiator to a champion chosen by the goddess of destiny. When the time permits, you shall be free and the whole world is waiting for you to explore.

2) Explore the world outside the Arena:
Gather your partners and form an adventure team. During the adventure, you will meet 8 friends with different personalities and unique skills. Explore more than 20 explorable areas , a large number of enemies waiting for you to conquer; countless treasures waiting for you to explore; rich plots and well-designed branch tasks waiting for you to participate !

3) Build your army and overthrow slave masters:
Alliance with powerful allies to attack the cruel battlefields in Freeland. Release the slave gladiators and recruit them into your own army. In the end, you will lead an invincible army of slave gladiators in an epic battle with a coalition of slave owners.

4) Expose the darkest secret behind evil
At the height of your power, when the slaveholders are defeated and retreated, an ultimate evil force spies on you from the darkness. Don't get carried away, be careful behind you!

5) Magic!
Discover and master your inborn power and become a wizard. You are a "God giver", and the whole Freeland will be subject to you as long as you want.

Key feature: (game features)



-Deep character building system:
Age of Reforger : Blackthorn provides players with a set of rich role cultivation system. Choose from 6 key attributes, 7 Weapon Specialization and more than 10 different combat genre. Combine hundreds of combat skills to create your own unique warrior. There is no fixed class, you will create your own unique class! In addition, your character will acquire many traits - innate or acquired - that will have a huge impact on the character's development.

-Massive weapons and equipment:
Equip your character with more than 600 weapons and armor, not only for combat effectiveness, but also for appearance! Each of our armor sets has a unique, well-designed look that will be reflected in the game's powerful paper doll system.

-Switchable Combat Mode
Choose the classic semi instant system or our unique turn based combat mode to play the game. The two different modes will give you different combat experience.

-Tactical editing and powerful AI system:
In combat, you can only control one Gladiator at a time. Other gladiators will be hosted by AI. However, you can edit each Gladiator's combat AI at any time to make them respond to different situations in the battle most appropriately. At the same time, players can switch battle mode automatically / manually at any time.

-Rich plots and choices:
Like all CRPG's, our plot is deep and selective. Different choices may lead the plot to different directions and also determine the life and death of many NPCs in the game. Many choices may not be so easy, always be ready to face the torture of conscience.

-Dynamic and open world:
1、 Open world
The whole world of the game is made up of many separate zones, which players will travel between during their adventures. Most of the major areas are open-ended scenarios with many feeder missions and exploration elements. Most of the buildings in the game can go in and out freely. We have built a set of dynamic housing system, so that players don't need to load when entering and leaving the house.

2、 Day and night cycles and weather system
The whole game world has the system of time passing and day and night alternation, which may affect the success or failure of some side mission. In addition, the game also has a dynamic weather system. Cloudy, sunny, rainy and snowy weather will appear randomly in the process of the game, and may even have a certain impact on the battle.

3、 Personalized NPC
All the people who live in towns and villages have their own behavioral logic. They will work, patrol, sell and wander in the daytime. Rest and eat when you are tired or hungry. In the evening, every NPC will go back to their own place to have a rest, and homeless NPC will even sleep on the floor.

  • Graphics: 2 GB, GeForce GTX 660/Radeon HD 7870
